data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Tristan da Cunha, Saint Helena. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tristan da Cunha, Saint Helena
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 26 believers in Tristan da Cunha, Saint Helena a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Tristan da Cunha, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 300 people living in the state of Tristan da Cunha.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Edinburgh of the Seven Seas
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Edinburgh of the Seven Seas, Tristan da Cunha, Saint Helena.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 26 believers in Tristan da Cunha, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 26 believers in Tristan da Cunha to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 26 believers in Tristan da Cunha against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
